comments: a(n) is the number of elements in the sequence A011557 (Powers of 10) that are less than n. For n > 1, a(n) is the number of digits in n-1. - _Tanya Khovanova_, Jun 22 2007
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = if n == 1 then 0 else 1 + A004216(n-1). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 22 2012
prog: (Haskell)a004218 n = if n == 1 then 0 else 1 + a004216 (n - 1)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
